column4: anyone know why my box freezes when i try to boot with my video card installed?
at what point does it lockup?
after post and during gnome loading?
the next time it locks up try "ctrl+backspace" I think that reloads X, might get you passed that point
also try tapping the "numlock" and "capslock" key to see if the lights go on/off... if nothing happens the system is probably hardlocked
I dont know off the top of my head. check grub dox + gnome startup dox
try the cap/numlock trick to see if it is indeed hardlocked
I am afraid i didnt under stand this: "maw> fish: I dont know off the top of my head. check grub dox + gnome startup dox" can you elaborate a little for me please?
you asked how to enable verbosity... I said I dont know
It was the dox that i wasnt understanding, Thank you doubledew
sorry
np maw, i will check those things and return with my results
I tried the caps lock thing and the lights on the keyboard did nothing, no response
are you dual booting to another OS?
no
I have fedora installed still but that only becaus i havnt transfered all my files over to Ub
I dont boot fedora though
and fedora loads fine?
oh... the fact you logged off IRC I thought you were using *this* computer for dual booting
yes, but not when i try to use the video card
are you ona  liveCD now
I have Ub installed completely on one HD and Fedora installed completely on another separate HD in the same box, I use GRUB boot loader to choose the OS and ubuntu is default
